questions.question: What is the definition of asexual reproduction?

choices.answer: requires the sexual interaction of two specialized organisms
an organism can reproduce without the involvement of another organism
a type of cell reproduction that results in two daughter cells
a type of cell division that results in four daughter cells

questions.question: What is the definition of gentics?

choices.answer: heredity and the variation of inherited characteristics.
the surroundings or conditions in which an organism lives or operates.
affect characteristics received by an organism at the cell level
affect characteristics received by an organism because of environment
